author: gdaniels
msg: Fix URL in functional tests so server actually quits.

author: gdaniels
msg: For now, I made a guess as to which Debug.Print()s should be
info(), debug(), and error() calls in log4j.  We should take a look at
these and make sure they're about accurate.  I'll finish converting
later today, and then get rid of the trusty Debug class.
One thing we really need to figure out is how best to initialize the
log4j package.  Right now I'm calling the BasicConfigurator and then
manually setting the root-level priority to FATAL so we don't see
any messags by default.  We need to be using the property based
configurator, but I want to make sure we do it right.
I tagged the tree before this change, so its easy to roll back if we have
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'pre-log4j'.
